医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蘑菇可以提高记忆力吗？蘑菇摄入量与认知表现之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Can-mushrooms-improve-your-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Can-mushrooms-improve-your-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b5dd8bf-5be1-4ff8-b9b0-929dc7f66249 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Can mushrooms improve your memory?
荷兰肺炎支原体病例意外激增，年轻人口受影响更大荷兰的一项研究报告称，自 2023 年 10 月以来，肺炎支原体感染人数显着上升，与上次流行病相比，患者的中位年龄显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Netherlands-sees-unexpected-surge-in-Mycoplasma-pneumoniae-cases-younger-population-more-affected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Netherlands-sees-unexpected-surge-in-Mycoplasma-pneumoniae-cases-younger-population-more-affected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3441d662-2aad-41f0-97f6-4eddffa56323 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 23:15:00 -0500 Netherlands sees unexpected surge in Mycoplasma pneumoniae cases, younger population more affected
研究表明音乐的普遍情感影响超越了文化界限研究人员发现，音乐在不同文化中都能唤起一致的情感和身体感觉，但西方和东亚参与者之间的熟悉度和特定身体部位的激活存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Study-reveals-musics-universal-emotional-impact-transcends-culture-boundaries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Study-reveals-musics-universal-emotional-impact-transcends-culture-boundaries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d788a0c-e309-400c-aea4-752d8e4935d2 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Study reveals music's universal emotional impact transcends cultural boundaries
鼻腔免疫系统如何对抗 SARS-CoV-2？研究人员发现，CD4+ 和 CD8+ T 细胞在清除鼻腔内的 COVID-19 感染中发挥着至关重要的作用，但对肺部感染的影响有限，这对于理解和治疗该病毒具有重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/How-does-the-nasal-cavitys-immune-system-combat-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/How-does-the-nasal-cavitys-immune-system-combat-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=322feb4d-94c5-4103-ad46-836c1ffda71f Sun, 28 Jan 2024 22:19:00 -0500 How does the nasal cavity's immune system combat SARS-CoV-2?
农业实践和鸟类迁徙模式与西尼罗河病毒在欧洲的传播有关研究发现，农业用地和鸟类迁徙是西尼罗河病毒在欧洲传播的关键因素，揭示了不同西尼罗河病毒谱系的独特进化途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Agriculture-practices-and-bird-migration-patterns-linked-to-West-Nile-virus-spread-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Agriculture-practices-and-bird-migration-patterns-linked-to-West-Nile-virus-spread-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=464253f5-48f5-42e6-8561-35787ce4eac9 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 18:59:00 -0500 Agricultural practices and bird migration patterns linked to West Nile virus spread in Europe
AI 在医疗保健领域的进步：GPT-3.5 和 4 在临床推理方面表现出色研究探索了使用 GPT-3.5 和 GPT-4 等大型语言模型 (LLM) 来模拟诊断临床推理，并使用诊断推理提示来评估其能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/AI-steps-up-in-healthcare-GPT-35-and-4-excel-in-clinical-reasoning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/AI-steps-up-in-healthcare-GPT-35-and-4-excel-in-clinical-reasoning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84b13117-4b3d-4135-a868-8b94b98be9fa Sun, 28 Jan 2024 18:22:00 -0500 AI steps up in healthcare: GPT-3.5 and 4 excel in clinical reasoning
24年来，英国儿童肥胖率的差距惊人地扩大《儿童疾病档案》的研究分析了 1995 年至 2019 年英国儿童超重和肥胖的趋势，揭示了日益扩大的社会经济和种族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Childhood-obesity-in-England-shows-alarming-rise-in-disparities-over-24-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Childhood-obesity-in-England-shows-alarming-rise-in-disparities-over-24-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91bb8474-099d-40d6-b24c-26c69286a936 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 18:06:00 -0500 Childhood obesity in England shows alarming rise in disparities over 24 years
禁食饮食有望改善情绪、睡眠和饮食行为《营养前沿》中的一项研究表明，禁食饮食 (FD) 可能会对饮食行为、情绪、睡眠和健康产生积极影响，这可能是由肠道微生物组变化介导的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Fasting-diets-show-promise-in-enhancing-mood-sleep-and-eating-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Fasting-diets-show-promise-in-enhancing-mood-sleep-and-eating-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=093021bf-18b2-4929-985d-07a52ee47dd6 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 17:50:00 -0500 Fasting diets show promise in enhancing mood, sleep, and eating behaviors
能量饮料引发大学生睡眠问题和失眠《BMJ Open》中的一项研究发现，挪威学生频繁饮用能量饮料与睡眠结果不佳有关，包括睡眠时间较短和失眠率较高，而且消费模式存在显着的性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Energy-drinks-stir-up-sleep-issues-and-insomnia-among-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Energy-drinks-stir-up-sleep-issues-and-insomnia-among-college-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085324e3-3e0b-4bb4-80f5-960039cf6302 Sun, 28 Jan 2024 17:39:00 -0500 Energy drinks stir up sleep issues and insomnia among college students
革命性的 CAR T 细胞疗法有望逆转与年龄相关的代谢功能障碍研究评估了针对老年小鼠 uPAR 阳性细胞的 senolytic CAR T 细胞疗法，显示其在减轻与年龄相关的代谢功能障碍方面的有效性，并为与衰老相关的疾病提供潜在的持久治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Revolutionary-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-reversing-age-lated-metabolic-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240128/Revolutionary-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-reversing-age-lated-metabolic-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ec4a19d-547c-4ade-b692-abc04b951e1c Sun, 28 Jan 2024 17:25:00 -0500 Revolutionary CAR T-cell therapy shows promise in reversing age-related metabolic dysfunction
